content.prompt: The way the kaiser and Bismarck are portrayed is best explained by the

choices.label: turn away from realistic forms of visual art in Europe
growing importance of public education in most European countries
increasing political and diplomatic tensions in Europe in the late nineteenth century
development of racial ideologies influenced by Social Darwinism

skill.text: Skill 4.B: Explain how a specific historical development or process is situated within a broader historical context.
